thread.title: The amenities were awesome!
thread.title_full: The amenities were awesome! - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amyeds
title: The amenities were awesome!
text: My daughter and I stayed at the Taj 51 in London for only a few days. I could've stayed much longer, but we needed to move on to travel! One of the best parts of the room was when we landed at 8 am, the room was ready for you and we were upgraded to a two bedroom suite. Our room had a kitchen, living room, two bedrooms and two baths! Everything was A+ all the way! The court yard was adorable! I cannot say enough good things about the Taj 51!!
